steps.data: <?php /* SLOTFILL_2FB190_EXAMPLE_LOAD can set to load individual slotFillExamples at src/index.js */ define('SLOTFILL_2FB190_EXAMPLE_LOAD', 'PluginDocumentSettingPanel'); function set_individual_example() { wp_add_inline_script( 'slotfill-2fb190', 'window.slotFill2FB190ExampleLoad = "'.SLOTFILL_2FB190_EXAMPLE_LOAD.'"', 'before' ); }
